original_text: As a trader, you bought and sold many things. As a result, you became violent and you did evil things. So I sent you away in shame. I would not allow you to remain on my mountain. The cherub that had been your guard chased you out. You could no longer walk among the stones that burned with fire. As a trader, you bought and sold many things.
korean_text: 네 무역이 많으므로 네 가운데에 강포가 가득하여 네가 범죄하였도다 너 지키는 그룹아 그러므로 내가 너를 더럽게 여겨 하나님의 산에서 쫓아냈고 불타는 돌들 사이에서 멸하였도다

sentences.original_text: As a trader, you bought and sold many things.
sentences.korean_translation: 상인으로서 너는 많은 것들을 사고 팔았다.

sentences.original_text: As a result, you became violent
So I sent you away in shame.
I would not allow you to remain on my mountain.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 내 산에 머물도록 허락하지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: The cherub that had been your guard chased you out.
You could no longer walk among the stones that burned with fire.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 더 이상 불타는 돌들 사이를 걸을 수 없었다.

sentences.original_text: As a trader, you bought and sold many things.
sentences.korean_translation: 상인으로서 너는 많은 것들을 사고 팔았다.
